metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11888 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
python-markdown2 through 2.3.8 allows XSS because element names are mishandled unless a \w+ match succeeds. For example, an attack might use elementname@ or elementname- with an onclick attribute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-markdown2 - 2.3.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-markdown2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.9-1').
